# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(summerfx VERSION 0.1.0 LANGUAGES C)

# target
add_executable(summerfx "")
set_target_properties(summerfx PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "summerfx")
set_target_properties(summerfx PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x86/release")
target_include_directories(summerfx SYSTEM PRIVATE
    C:/Users/peter/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/r/raylib/5.0/447da3a5bb1143848ad3d94d125db594/include
    C:/Users/peter/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/l/lua/v5.4.7/1316c207e7114f3b9bac50721a0a055b/include/lua
)
target_compile_options(summerfx PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(summerfx PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(summerfx PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(summerfx PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET summerfx PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(summerfx PRIVATE
    raylib
    opengl32
    lua
    gdi32
    user32
    winmm
    shell32
)
target_link_directories(summerfx PRIVATE
    C:/Users/peter/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/r/raylib/5.0/447da3a5bb1143848ad3d94d125db594/lib
    C:/Users/peter/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/l/lua/v5.4.7/1316c207e7114f3b9bac50721a0a055b/lib
)
target_sources(summerfx PRIVATE
    src/main.c
    src/modules/constants.c
    src/modules/graphics2d.c
    src/modules/input.c
    src/modules/structs.c
    src/modules/text.c
    src/modules/window.c
)
